name: extension
description: Codestory's extension for SOTA agentic editing

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint

aide.activeDirectories.description: Set the active directories for Aide to look at as comma separated values of absolute path. For example: /a/b/c , /d/e/f

aide.testSuiteRunCommand.description: Tell Aide how to run your test suite, for example for jest framework and when using yarn the command will be: `yarn run jest test`

codestory.openaiApiKey.description: Use a custom api key for OpenAI

codestory.disableTelemetry.description: Disable telemetry and logging on the backend

codestory.disableUseNameLookup.description: Disable user name lookup from env

aide.systemInstruction.description: Set custom instructions for the AI, this can be information about the repository you are working or nuances you want the AI to handle

aide.useExactSelection.description: Uses the exact matching of the selection rather than expanding on it

aide.sidecarURL.description: The url of the sidecar which is required for aide to work

aide.sidecarUseSelfRun.description: If the side-binary is being run on its own, we can set this to true allowing for rapid proto-typing

aide.inlineCompletion.triggerMode.description: Set the trigger mode for inline completions, can be either of automatic or manual

aide.inlineCompletion.enableTabAutocompl.description: Enable tab autocomplete for inline completions

aide.inlineCompletion.toggleTabAutoCompl.description: Toggle tab autocomplete for inline completions

aide.inlineCompletion.copyClipBoardConte.description: Should we allow clip board content to be sent over

aide.deepReasoning.description: Should use deep reasoning before making edits

aide.specialToolAgentUseAtYourOwnRisk.description: Tool use agent, use it at your own risk this is not ready for production yet
